respect.title: 1. Respect and Kindness
respect.items0: Treat all members with dignity. Be patient and courteous, especially when interacting with learners who are still building proficiency in a new language.
respect.items1: Avoid using offensive or discriminatory language, including slurs, insults, or remarks that target someone's gender, ethnicity, race, religion, sexual orientation, or physical/mental abilities.
respect.items2: When offering corrections or suggestions, do so politely and constructively.

inclusivity.title: 2. Inclusivity and Welcoming Culture
inclusivity.items0: Encourage a supportive environment where everyone feels safe sharing thoughts, questions, and cultural perspectives.
inclusivity.items1: Acknowledge and celebrate cultural differences. Ask questions and listen with empathy—remember that language is closely tied to culture.
inclusivity.items2: Strive to make space for diverse voices and experiences in discussions. If you notice someone being left out or uncomfortable, consider reaching out and inviting them to participate.

communication.title: 3. Appropriate and Constructive Communication
communication.items0: Focus on language learning and cultural exchange. Share helpful resources, experiences, and constructive feedback.
communication.items1: Avoid spamming, self-promotion, or off-topic discussions that detract from the community's main purpose.
communication.items2: Refrain from sharing explicit or overly graphic content. Keep discussions professional and courteous.

safety.title: 4. Safety and Privacy
safety.items0: Respect members' personal boundaries and privacy. Do not pressure anyone to share more personal information than they are comfortable with.
safety.items1: Avoid posting private conversations or sensitive data (e.g., personal contact information, financial data) in public forums or group discussions.
safety.items2: If you see content or behavior that makes you feel unsafe or violates our guidelines, report it immediately through the appropriate channel.

harassment.title: 5. No Tolerance for Harassment or Hate Speech
harassment.items0: Harassment, bullying, intimidation, or targeted attacks against any individual or group are strictly prohibited.
harassment.items1: Hate speech and threats of violence or harm will lead to immediate action, which may include content removal or account suspension.

conflictResolution.title: 6. Constructive Conflict Resolution
conflictResolution.items0: Healthy debates can help people learn, but keep disagreements respectful. Attack ideas rather than individuals.
conflictResolution.items1: If a dispute escalates, use the platform's conflict-resolution tools or reach out to moderators for guidance.
conflictResolution.items2: Encourage calm dialogue. In cross-cultural interactions, differences of perspective are natural. Approach these differences with an open mind.

reporting.title: 7. Reporting and Enforcement
reporting.items0: We rely on community members to help us maintain a positive space. If you witness or experience harassment, hate speech, or any violation of these guidelines, please report it to our moderation team.
reporting.items1: Our moderation team will review all reports. Appropriate actions—such as content removal, warnings, or account suspension—will be taken promptly to address violations.

improvement.title: 8. Continuous Improvement
improvement.items0: Recognize that our community evolves as language-learning trends and cultural dynamics change. We welcome feedback on our guidelines to better serve and protect everyone.
improvement.items1: Updates to these guidelines will be posted and highlighted. Members are responsible for familiarizing themselves with the latest policies.

purpose.title: 9. Platform Purpose First
purpose.items0: Keep interactions aligned with the community's core goal: language learning and cultural exchange.
purpose.items1: Stay focused and respectful of the space we're all building together.
purpose.items2: Avoid derailing discussions or dominating conversations in ways that prevent others from participating.

roleModel.title: 10. Be a Role Model
roleModel.items0: Set a positive example for others. Encourage good behavior by being inclusive, helpful, and respectful in your own interactions.
roleModel.items1: Small actions—like welcoming a new member or giving constructive feedback—help shape the overall culture of Loqu.
